post:
Hello,
We've got a new node in Baltimore and here's our new offer, also do note, these will be provisioned only on our Baltimore  Node and not on the North Carolina Node.

All the Baltimore VPS's come with,
100 Mbit Shared line
Dedicated RAM 
8 Shared Cores of 2 X L5420 Processors at 2.50 Ghz each core.
1 Static IPv4
SolusVM

OpenVZ Yearly Plan Details :
256 MB Guaranteed RAM
512 MB vSWAP
20 GB HDD
**Unmetered 100 Mbit/sec bandwidth**
SolusVM Control Panel
8 Shared Cores of 2 X L5420 Processors at 2.50 Ghz each core (Each processor has 4 cores, so 2 x 4 = 8)

**Order Link :**
https://crowncloud.net/clients/cart.php?a=add&pid=24


Test IP : 74.112.206.98
Location : Baltimore, MD, USA
IPv6 Info : No ETA as yet from the DC, but should be coming soon ;)
Terms And Conditions and Acceptable User Policy of our VPS Hosting Service : http://wiki.crowncloud.net/doku.php?id=vps_tos

Contact us at support@crowncloud.net if you need any pre-sales info or support.
or join us on IRC at #CrownCloud on FreeNode !

All orders are manually processed and may take upto 12 hours for activation, Please use a valid email when signing up as the details of the VPS will be emailed to you, All VPS's on the Baltimore Node come with a 100 Mbit Shared line.

Supported OS for OpenVZ,
CentOS 6
CentOS 5
Debian 6
Ubuntu 12.04
or any other template from (http://wiki.openvz.org/Download/template/precreated) but only from the "Precreated section"

Contact us at support@crowncloud.net if you need any pre-sales info or support.
or join us on IRC at #CrownCloud on FreeNode !

Thanks !
